command.action

Class MoveCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • command.AbstractGameCommand
      • command.action.ActionCommand
        • command.action.MoveCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IdentityDiscMoveCommand, PlayerMoveCommand

    public class MoveCommand
extends ActionCommand
    The Move event handles all the logic for a player to move from one square to the other. It takes into account all the possible constraints and effects. Such as Teleports, LightGrenades and various other items.
    Author:
    Dieter Castel, Jonas Devlieghere and Stefan Pante

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MoveCommand(Game game, Movable movable, Square startSquare, Direction dir)
      Moves the movable( Player and IdentityDisc for now) into a certain direction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MoveCommand

        public MoveCommand(Game game,
           Movable movable,
           Square startSquare,
           Direction dir)
        Moves the movable( Player and IdentityDisc for now) into a certain direction.
        Parameters:
        game - the Game.
        movable - the movable which moves across the grid.
        startSquare - the Square on which the move initiates.
        dir - the direction in which the identityDisc moves.
